description.translate: Behind this worn-out appearance lies a youthful spirit.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Pli du viellard\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Derrière cette apparence usée, se\"}","{\"text\":\"§7cache un esprit jeune.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Behind this worn-out appearance\"}","{\"text\":\"§7lies a youthful spirit.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a4 §7RES§c-1\"}"]}}
